text: Amara Sy (born August 28, 1981) is a Malian-French professional basketball player Paris Basketball of the LNB Pro B. He is also a member of the Mali national basketball team. On July 31, 2015, he signed with AS Monaco after a three-year run with ASVEL Basket. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:AEK B.C. players Category:AS Monaco Basket players Category:ASVEL Basket players Category:Bakersfield Jam players Category:CB Murcia players Category:French expatriate basketball people in Spain Category:French men's basketball players Category:French people of Malian descent Category:French expatriate sportspeople in Monaco Category:French expatriate basketball people in the United States Category:French expatriate basketball people in Monaco Category:Le Mans Sarthe Basket players Category:Liga ACB players Category:Malian men's basketball players Category:Orléans Loiret Basket players Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Paris
title: Amara Sy
